#sidebar Sidebar

== _class_ !CssImportImportsMinifierFilter _extends_ [ApiMinifierFiltersACssMinifierFilter aCssMinifierFilter] ==
This [ApiMinifierFiltersACssMinifierFilter minifier filter] will parse and import external css files defined in 
@import at-rules into the current source.

For this filter you have to set the configuration parameter `BasePath` to a valid physical path.

*Example:*
{{{
/* Content of "path/to/external.css" is:
body
	{
	color: #000;
	}
*/
@import url("path/to/external.css");
p
	{
	margin: 0.5em 0;
	}
}}}
*Will get imported like:*
{{{
p
	{
	margin: 0.5em 0;
	}
body
	{
	color: #000;
	}
}}}
----

==== `integer` _public_ apply(`array` &$tokens) ====
Implements [ApiMinifierFiltersACssMinifierFilter#Methods aCssMinifierFilter::apply].

Applys the filter logic on the array of [ApiTokensACssToken tokens] and returns the amount of [ApiTokensACssToken tokens]
added or 0 if no @import at-rule was found or not processable
 * `array` &$tokens : Array of [ApiTokensACssToken tokens]
 * *Returns:* `integer` Amount of added, changed or removed tokens; a return value large than 0 will rebuild the array
